docs.lead_paragraph: Older men using a popular drug to treat urinary problems are more than twice as likely as those who do not to suffer serious complications after cataract surgery, a study has found.

headline.main: Cataract Surgery Complications Are Linked to a Urinary Drug
headline.print_headline: Cataract Surgery Complications Are Linked to a Urinary Drug

docs.snippet: Older men using a popular drug to treat urinary problems are more than twice as likely as those who do not to suffer serious complications after cataract surgery, a study has found.

docs.lead_paragraph: Soon citizens will be able to learn which doctors have been paid and how much by the makers of the brand name drugs for which they wrote prescriptions.

docs.lead_paragraph: Today Millburn Superintendent of Schools Dr. Richard Brodow announced his retirement, effective at the end of next year. The text of the e-mail message he sent this morning is below. He will have served in the Millburn Township School District for eight years. The Local spoke to him this afternoon about his thoughts on his time in Millburn.

headline.main: Brodow: Next Year Is My Last

docs.abstract: Dr. Richard Brodow, Millburn's superintendent of schools, plans to announce his retirement at Monday night's board meeting. In an interview, he says the events of the last few months have nothing to do with his decision.
docs.snippet: Dr. Richard Brodow, Millburn's superintendent of schools, plans to announce his retirement at Monday night's board meeting. In an interview, he says the events of the last few months have nothing to do with his decision.
